resources.string: Put a little less stress on your eyes.
If you have a GitHub user name then please include it in the content.
Network state permission is needed to check if network is up.
Internet permission is needed to test projects.
Storage permission is needed to create and edit projects.
Use a PIN for extra security.
Choose how long to wait before saving a file.
Allow File Access From File URLs
Set whether JavaScript running in the context of a file scheme URL can access content from other file scheme URLs.
Allow Universal Access From File URLs
Set whether JavaScript running in the context of a file scheme URL can access content from any origin.
Set whether to load image resources from the network.
Set whether to load any resources from the network.
Set whether the builtin zoom mechanisms are being used.
Set whether the database storage API is enabled.
Set whether to display onscreen zoom controls while using builtin zoom mechanisms.
Set whether the DOM Storage APIs are enabled.
Set whether JavaScript can open windows automatically.
Set whether pages are loaded in overview mode.
Set whether images are loaded automatically.
Set whether form data is saved.
Set whether the \"viewport\" HTML meta tag is supported or will a wide viewport be used.
Project no longer showing in the Improve or Pilot menus? Click here to repair any broken projects.
